ProductInfo.Features:
Includes 2 all-weather, high resolution 480TVL cameras with powerful night vision to 65ft/20m, add 2 more cameras of your choice for full 4 channel monitoring
View & record up to 4 channels of high quality video simultaneously in real time
Surveillance in the palm of your hand with live viewing on 3G-enabled Smartphones including iPhone, iPad, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Mobile 6, Symbian OS & more, with remote notification via email
Save time & have peace of mind by easily locating incident video, then transfer to USB flash drive
Fight back against crime by deterring intruders, protecting your property & knowing what's happening at all times
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWDVK-13002C / Swann DVR4-1300 4 Channel DVR with Smartphone Viewing & 2 x PRO-560 Cameras (exclusive to Maplin) 4 Channel Digital Video Recorder with pre-installed 500GB HDD / H.264 latest recording technology / Web and Smartphone connection for remote viewing / Transfer incidents to USB flash drive / 2 x CCD cameras, add an additional 2 cameras / VGA connection
